GS activity were homogenized with10 mM Tris–HCl buffer (pH 7.6, containing 1 mM MgCl 2, 1 mM EDTA and 1 mM 2-mercaptoethanol) and centrifuged at 15,000× g for 10 min at 4 °C. The supernatant as enzyme extract was used for GS assay. GS activity was assayed by monitoring the formation of glutamyl hydroxamate at 540 nm after reacting with 2 ml of 2.5% (w/v) FeCl 3 and 5% (w/v) trichloroacetic acid
42 .
